languages.text: "Император, благодарю тебя за то, что хранишь нас и оберегаешь нас орудиями своими, даже теми, чью чистоту и святость я постичь неспособна".
"God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
languages.original_text: "Император, благодарю тебя за то, что хранишь нас и оберегаешь нас орудиями своими, даже теми, чью чистоту и святость я постичь неспособна".

traits.locale_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
"God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
"God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
"God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
"God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
"God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."

languages.text: «Dios Emperador, Te doy las gracias por protegernos, aunque haya instrumentos de Tu protección cuya pureza y divinidad nunca podré entender».
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."

traits.locale_text: «Dios Emperador, Te doy las gracias por protegernos, aunque haya instrumentos de Tu protección cuya pureza y divinidad nunca podré entender».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下よ、お守りくださり感謝します。たとえ、その純粋さと神聖さが私には理解できなくとも」
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下よ、お守りくださり感謝します。たとえ、その純粋さと神聖さが私には理解できなくとも」

languages.text: “神皇在上，感谢您保佑我们。您的守护使者是如此纯洁、如此神圣，远远超出了我的理解范畴。”
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."

traits.locale_text: “神皇在上，感谢您保佑我们。您的守护使者是如此纯洁、如此神圣，远远超出了我的理解范畴。”

languages.text: "Gottimperator, ich danke Euch, dass Ihr uns beschützt, obwohl es Instrumente Eures Schutzes gibt, deren Reinheit und Heiligkeit ich wohl nie verstehen werde."
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."

traits.locale_text: "Gottimperator, ich danke Euch, dass Ihr uns beschützt, obwohl es Instrumente Eures Schutzes gibt, deren Reinheit und Heiligkeit ich wohl nie verstehen werde."

languages.text: « Ô Empereur-Dieu, grâce vous soit rendue de veiller sur nous, même s'il est des instruments de Votre protection dont la pureté et la sainteté m'échapperont toujours. »
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."

traits.locale_text: « Ô Empereur-Dieu, grâce vous soit rendue de veiller sur nous, même s'il est des instruments de Votre protection dont la pureté et la sainteté m'échapperont toujours. »

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator, bizi koruduğun için şükürler olsun. Her ne kadar bizi korurken saflığını ve kutsallığını belki de asla anlayamayacağım yöntemler kullansan da..."
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, I thank Thee for protecting us, even though there are instruments of Your protection whose purity and holiness I may never understand."
